name: Captain TrashDog and His Riverboat Quest to Clean the Canal
name_original: Captain TrashDog and His Riverboat Quest to Clean the Canal
description:
Kenney Jam 2022 Submission

Set sail in the canals of KenneyTown as Captain TrashDog, a riverboat captain who is positively fed up with how the citizens have been treating the waters that he lives upon. 

Grow your trash pile and wallet by collecting trash in the river and depositing it in the TeleTube. The bigger the trash pile, the healthier the environment. 

Credits

https://kenney.nl/assets/

Fluffing a Duck Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
